title: HELP have blank champion select page IN RANKED
body: when i load into my ranked games the champion select page was blank. it had the outlines of things but was almost completely black. NEED HELP

replies.body: Unless you have any third party addons getting in the way, you may have a corrupted update or install that can't properly load content.  If you're using the updated client, it may be necessary to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)to a clean slate.  If you're using the legacy then our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can automatically do that for you.  I hope that helps!
